comment.author: Katherine
comment.text: Nothing like security having their backs to the surrounding area....think I would be looking away from the family..the threat isn't them..

replies.author: Morgan
replies.text: Should be looking around in 360 degree radius..need better stationing so they can see the whole picture..From outside to within the perimeter where he will enter.

replies.author: Katherine
replies.text: Something happens to this man we are screwed!!

replies.author: Conrad
replies.text: Who's better than trump?? Hillary will bury us..so dont be stupid democrats..
